source.author: Walsh, N.G.
source.title: Gynatrix
source.in_title: Flora of Victoria. Vol. 3. Dicotyledons Winteraceae to Myrtaceae
source.citation: From: Walsh, N.G. (1996). Gynatrix. In: Walsh, N.G.; Entwisle, T.J. (eds), Flora of Victoria. Vol. 3. Dicotyledons Winteraceae to Myrtaceae. Inkata Press, Melbourne.

leads.lead_text: Leaves broad-ovate (cordate at base), length 1.3–2 times width, at least the lower surface obscured by a dense and continuous indumentum of grey or white stellate hairs; calyx densely stellate-pubescent; petals of male flowers 6–10 cm long

Leaves narrowly ovate to lanceolate (cordate at base), length 2–3 times width, both surfaces green (but lower surface sometimes partly obscured by pale or rusty stellate hairs); calyx glabrous or with scattered stellate hairs; petals of male flowers 4–5 mm long
